reviews.review: Fantastic game except for the fact that your match-making is by FAR the WORST I have ever seen in any game. I have NEVER had a problem joining multiplayer games until I played this (and all of my buddies experience the same problem). Until you fix this, I will not suggest this game to anybody for the simple fact that it isn't a game if you cannot even play it.

Welcome to "Game Lobby Simulator 2016."
That's basically the game right now, as it's horribly bugged. The devs appear to be working on it, but it's not getting fixed fast enough. If you want to buy an early access game labeled as a full release, where you spend more time hitting 'ready' than actually playing, then this is the game for you.
I sincerely hope to post a better review in the future, as I looked forward to this games release for ages. Right now its an underwhelming, unfinished game that desperately needs help. That said, I'll keep on kplaying because when it does work, it's fantastic. I'm only recommending because I believe it'll be fixed one day.
10 фейскемперов на буббе из 10 возможных

Would be a great game, but lobby system needs to be fixed. It makes me not want to play the game after pressing ready over and over again just to see "failed to join a game or no matches" after 20+ minutes it gets a little old. I would recommend the game, but as of right now I say fuck it not worth the money. :(

Great game, just wish they'd fix the broken party system.  I don't want to have to sit there for thirty minutes trying to find a game just so I can play with my friends.

10/10, would get brutally murdered again

+I have had a lot of fun playing this game, it is always very intense both on the survivors' and the killer's side. I play this game casually, but I can say there have been moments where I have practiced loops and blinds in the hopes of giving me a competitive edge. This game is great if you want to play an intense multiplayer game. This is a great buy!

-If you are considering to purchase this game then I suggest using a good PC as you may experience latency issues even with the dedicated servers.

You know the scene at the end of Blair witch and the dude was standing in the corner to scared to move. Well i finally understood that scene after experiencing a similar situation. Killer dude kills hangs 2 of the 4 survivor leaving me and another. Catching me and certain death ,instead he drags me to a generator and hits it and lets me wiggle free. I could run and die as he was a super perk killer (had 4 superperks as i found out after the game). Or just finish it out hoping he doesnt kill me. After finishing the generator which was the last one. I just rushed to the exit and opened the door still uncertain if he would just kill me anyways. But he let me go.... Will run for my life again!

2016年买的游戏，玩了3000多小时，昨天被恶意举报，封禁了。
启动游戏，8014，游戏初始化失败，游戏存档失败。
玩屠夫，排队20分钟，游戏5分钟，还不敢带好道具，不敢惹人类不开心，人家随手一个举报，你就有被封号的危险。

this game is one of the best games i've played in a long time. even after so many rounds, they all feel new and all bring new experiences. each game i jump into is completely different whether its the map, the killer, or the playstyle of my team mates. playing with your friends makes it 10 times better, although the lobby system is currently pretty slow and  hitting the ready button 20 times can be pretty annoying,  communication brings the game to life.  the spook factor is pretty high, it's not like dead realm (which banked on jumpscares 24/7) instead its way more with jumpscares included. it gets your adrenaline pumping and the mass panic causes terrible descisions to be made and leaves you wondering why you made such a dumb choice.  overall it's a solid game and worth the money.
НОРМИК ИГРУХА. е купляйте не стоет тиз денег

DBD could be a very fun game, were the devs to get their act together. This game has been out for multiple years and, while it has its moments, it is still very broken. In fact, every update seems to brake something for everything it fixes. There's also the games cheapo servers that have god awful lag-compensation. You can and will get hit from miles away, and you will also miss hits from point blank range (not due to dead hard). I really do love this game, but until the devs go back and unspahgettify the code, only buy the game to play with friends.

Finger weg von dem Spiel!

Die Killer haben "Wallhack" Preks die es legal erlauben dich zu sehen mitlerweile haben die Killer 4 Perks die man einfach nicht kontern kann.
Neuen Kontent gibt es auch nicht immer das selbe ein Overpowered Killer kommt raus mit üblen Perks und die Survivor bleiben auf der Strecke.

Zudem das das Spiel so simple aufgebaut ist und schon ein paar Jahre besteht gibt es viel zu viele Bugs. Mein Tipp an die Entwickler geht nochmal zur Schule und lernt das richtig. 

Wenn es geht würde ich sofort mein Geld zurückverlangen!!!

Dann gibt es ja noch die Camperkiller für die die Strafe ein Witz ist und die Lieben Dev´s machen gar nichts sitzen da und Zählen ihr Geld. Das Spiel ist so stark auf Killer aufgebaut das die Survivor mit Stock und Stein gegen einen Panzer kämpfen.

Klar gibt es Survivor die richtig gut sind und den Killer auf die Schippe nehmen. Dies trifft aber kaum auf Gelegenheitsspieler zu!

Dann kommen wir noch zu den Ragequittern:
Mein Lösungsvorschlag 
1. Quit 5 Minuten Sperre sofort 
2. Quit 30 Minuten Sperre
3. Quit 24 Stunden Sperre
4. Quit 7 Tage Sperre

für die ersten 3 Punkte gibt es ein Cooldown von 24 Stunden (d.h. Wenn in 24 Stunden ein Spieler 3 mal Quitter hat er die 24 Stunden Sperre ansonsten resettet sich der CD nach 24 Stunden)


Aber was weiß ich schon ;-) ich bin ja nur einer von vielen!

Egal seis drum Fakt ist das die Entwickler ihren Arsch nicht hoch kriegen und lieber Ihr Geld zählen bis das spiel tot ist.

一个小作坊出的游戏成这样很不错了，所以大家要求不能太过高。加入了简中，能开黑很不错，虽然游戏的观赏性大于可玩性但还是很值得入手的，最后建议开通创意工坊让游戏更多的可玩性交到玩家的手中，这样工作室可以处理更多的事情。
I highly reccomend this game, although dwight not being buffed is a huge letdown and some problems need to be fixed, other than that this is a great game

Due to recent changes I happily can recommend this game. There are several reviews going into explicit detail about why this game is amazing, but I'm just going to say that not once in two years have I ever considered quitting on it for good.

I always end up coming back to this amazing game. 8/10 would recommend.

เกมส์นี้เป็นเกมส์ที่สนุกในระดับที่บางคนติด จนไปถึงติดมาก
เป็นเกมส์ที่แยกประเภทการเล่น 2 แบบด้วยกัน คือ ผู้หนีรอด กับฆาตกร
โดยแบ่งเป็นทีม ผู้หนีรอด 4 คนกับ 1 ฆาตกร 

ผู้หนีรอดจะต้องหนีออกจากสถานที่แห่งหนึ่ง ซึ่งมีประตูไฟฟ้าที่ปิดอยู่
และผู้หนีรอดจะต้องปั่นเครื่องปั่นไฟให้ครบ 5 เครื่อง จึงจะสามารถเปิดประตูไฟฟ้าเพื่อหนีออกไปได้
ส่วนฆาตกรนั้นก็ทำตรงกันข้ามกับผู้หนีรอด นั่นก็คือ ฆ่าให้หมดทุกคน

ตัวละครจะมีความสามารถแตกต่างกันออกไปตามลักษณะตัวละครนั้นๆ
โดยผู้หนีรอดจะแบ่งย่อยเป็น 4 ตัวละคร และฆาตกรจะแบ่งย่อยออกเป็น 3 ตัวละคร

I (Duck) solo queued as a rank 20, level 2 survivor after already losing many games as survivor.  I was matched with 3 other survivors with a single perk (one had an uncommon, and the other two had single rare perks).  How is it possible that we were matched against a rank 15 killer with 4 ultra-rare perks (No One Escapes Death, Insidious, Whispers, and Spies from the Shadows)? I'd venture to say that the most important issue this game has is the terrible matchmaking.  I think folks would be willing to cope with the DC's, lobby issues, lag, broken infinites, broken perks, bugs, etc., but the poorly designed, illogical matchmaking system makes it boring for the high-ranked people to play.  At the same time, the new people trying to enjoy your game are quickly discouraged from playing.  I have had the same issues with trying to play killer.  Low rank, low level killers also get matched with high rank, high-level survivors.  

If the developers continue to keep the poor matchmaking in the game, beginners will be frustrated and quit, and experienced players will get bored with the game and quit.  It's a shame.  The concept of the game is great.  The music goes well with the action.  I won't recommend this to my friends until the matchmaking is resolved.  I would hate to introduce them to a game that will put them in the situation I just experienced.  I don't see it as anything different than the developers forcing high-ranked and experienced players to cheat.
its amazing

プレイ時間100時間　サバイバー・キラー共にやりこんだがサバイバー有利な部分が多すぎてつまらない(仕様・バグ含め)。高ランクのサバイバーはチームで試合をしている人達も多く、VCによる連携をされると立ち回りやパークがほぼ意味を持たなくなりただ追いかけるだけの鬼ごっこになるので非常につまらない。さらにはチーム全員がプレイヤー有利ポイントを知っていてバグ部分でも平気で利用(地下室階段の中腹しゃがみ待機)するので目の前にいても攻撃できない状態などになり、時間の無駄だが切断するとこちらだけ損をするという始末。ゲーム内の仕様だけで完敗したのなら悔しくて即再戦！となりますが、バグやvc(外部ツール)の利用でゲームがめちゃくちゃにされたら不快なだけ。その部分だけなんとかなればもっと楽しめたのになと思います。あとラグが酷い時があるけど、それは対処法あるし相手もラグっているので運が悪かったで済ませばいいと思う(直って快適プレイできることに越したことはないけど)

Very good spook3 game and it is very fun to play with friends. I thouroghly enjoy the perk system as well as the leveling. Fun to play as killer or survivor both are incredibly interesting and have aspects that make them both worth the while. All in all gud gaem.

Its a great game but has glaring issues first of which the matchmaking sysetem is a joke if u get this game expect to be paird with rank 1-5 killers with all of thier perks, certainly not new user friendly. Second the inabiltiy to find a good match what with killers constantly leaving, laggy hosts, dc survs, coupled with the punishment of trying to get a survive with firends match makes the real challange of the game just trying to play. Theres definantly a few bugs here and there but thats to be expected however i do feel as if there are some clear quality of life changes that could be made that simply are not. My hope is that devs step up their game a bit. I do recommend this game the fact is the framework for hours of fun exists u just have to take it with a grain of frustration until positive changes are made. This game is relitivly new but is approaching that no excuses date quickly, so lets see what happens, i for one am hoping for the best i do enjoy this game.
Топовый хоррор!

Honestly I love playing this game when I can find a match, the suspense and the intensity of this game is unparallelled in any game I've played. Despite the fact the community is constantly complaining over hook campers or dodging, when you get into that game (whenever it may be) you are hard-pressed to have a bad time.

Крутая игра! Сразу завлекла тема маньяка и жертв, как не странно, однообразный геймпей не надоедает. С друзьями весело выживать. Можно одному за маньяка поубивать свинок или пофармиться (добрый маньк) и получить кучу очков. Рекомендуется всем, кому понравились фильмы типа "Пятница 13" и похожие, и хочет хоть немного на такие фильмы похожую игру.
Everything but joining lobby with friends is awesome 8/10.

好玩
我 日尼玛 。我真的不想说这游戏了，好玩是好玩。就是尼玛BUG不断，最近更新了， 组队匹配秒闪退。请问官方能治疗不？有时候真心不想玩了。麻烦官方更新能整点有用的啊。我每次点单人匹配的时候，都是一直点准备，准备，这边就显示，没找到，没找到。一个劲的对着跟我干。组队，更坑爹了。也是一直点，一直点。。。我不知道，是我网络问题，还是游戏太傻逼。。老子尼玛100M网路都不行，那就只有别玩了。

更新了之后物品消失的bug更频繁了，但匹配系统似乎优化了，匹人也快了不用半小时才匹到一盘了（半小时一盘夸张？之前匹4黑的时候是真的）
这游戏玩的就是个刺激。还带中文，光凭bug多并不足以导致我不给好评。好评妥妥的。
希望游戏厂商把这个网络优化一下，卡的太常见了。玩个躲猫猫还卡  这怎么玩？
服务器偶尔会卡顿  其他不错
The best game ever, with friends or without friends.. You shall buy it soon! :)

Oyun Gerçekten Size Çerezlik Bir oyun olduğunu Unutturuyor ve Saatlerce Başından Kalkmıyorsunuz.

-İyi Yönleri

-Kendine has zevkli oynanışı
-Gerilimi gerçekten hissettirmesi
-Atmosfer
-Ses kalitesi

-Kötü Yönler

-Matchmaking rezalet
-Bugsuz oyun nerdeyse geçmiyor
-Kısıtlı karakter düzenleme seçenekleri
-Çökmeler
非常不错的一款游戏，还更新了中文版本，段位的优化也让不少玩家好上段了。游戏也非常不错。
